time_parameter_reason: to eliminate seasonal patterns in the residuals and reduce residuals to white noise

humidity_temporal_decision: same day and lags up to 2 days or averaged over 0-2 days
temperature_temporal_decision: same day and lags up to 2 days or averaged over 0-2 days

PM_temporal_reason: previous studies reported stronger associations with lagged or cumulative exposures
PM_temporal_decision: 2-day average of lag 0 and 1 (lag 01) and single-day lag of 2 days (lag 2)

temperature_parameter_reason: expected dose-response relationship to be much smoother
time_parameter_reason: to ensure removal of all long wavelength patterns from the data
PM_temporal_decision: mean of non-missing concentrations on same and previous day

time_parameter_reason: to minimize the sum of the autocorrelation of the residuals
humidity_temporal_decision: previous day or up to 3 previous days or average of a few days
temperature_temporal_decision: previous day or up to 3 previous days or average of a few days
